metadata.title: Perry Ellis Men's Winter Coat - Heavyweight Parka Jacket with Cargo Pockets
features: High Quality Men’s Winter Coat: We fashioned this heavyweight parka from wind and water resistant fabric; Perfect for winter sports and casual wear
Functional Benefits: Keep your neck warm with the hood and high collar; Snap closure cargo pockets cover chilly hands and keep your valuables safe
Style Benefits: Bundle up in fashion; The classic short length cut is complete with chin guard and radjustable wrist cuffs; You’ll stand out in the crowd of basic winter coats this season
Multipurpose: Use this jacket for skiing, snowboarding, hiking, skating, sledding, and many other cold-weather activities
Easy Care: Machine Wash, Tumble Dry; Please Reference the Product Description for More Details
description: Perry Ellis Men's Winter Coat - Heavyweight Parka Jacket with Cargo Pockets

is the jacket to wear for guys who like to spend time outdoors. You’ll appreciate the warmth and convenience of the large snap pockets, the big hood, and the snap-over-zip front closure. The unique construction of our insulated jacket will help you conquer freezing temperatures without weighing you down.
Roomy for comfort over mid-weight layers, locking in your body's temperature without restricting movement.
